Portable Class Library for SQLite. v3.8.2.0

Supports .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Store, and Windows Phone 8 applications.

ADDITIONAL INSTRUCTIONS

.NET Framework 4.5
Please, download the SQLite precompiled binary for Windows v3.8.2 from the SQLite.org site (http://sqlite.org/2013/sqlite-dll-win32-x86-3080200.zip), extract the sqlite3.dll file, and add it as Copy-Always Content to the root folder of the project.

Windows Store
Please, verify that the extension SDK SQLite for Windows Runtime v3.8.2, from the SQLite.org site (http://sqlite.org/2013/sqlite-winrt-3080200.vsix), has been properly installed.

Windows Phone 8
Please, verify that the extension SDK SQLite for Windows Phone v3.8.2, from the SQLite.org site (http://sqlite.org/2013/sqlite-wp80-winrt-3080200.vsix), has been properly installed.
